name: Stock Requisition Acknowledgment
description: Response message acknowledging receipt and status of stock requisition orders from inventory systems
businessPurpose: Acknowledge stock requisition receipt and communicate order status changes back to the requesting department
timing: Sent by inventory systems in response to stock requisition order messages (O05)
realWorldScenarios: Central supply confirms sterile instrument set available for surgery
Pharmacy acknowledges IV fluid order but reports partial availability
Warehouse confirms equipment requisition with delivery schedule
Supply system reports out-of-stock item with suggested substitution
Laboratory supply confirms reagent order with expiration date notice
Materials management acknowledges bulk order with cost center allocation

generationRules.MSA.2: Original message control ID from requisition order
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - requisition acknowledgment affects inventory management and operational planning
